name: Creta
description:
"A door appeared in your house"

Made for Game Maker Italia's TERROROCTOBER jam 2020, developed with Game Maker Studio 2.3 and heavily inspired by a movie called "The Navidson Record".
There's some differences, though.


Being a Jam game, Creta is not stable nor tested. Still, I hope you'll enjoy it!

I miss you.

CONTROLS

WASD keys - Movement
Mouse Left button - Interact
Mouse Right button - Toggle flashlight when surrounded by darkness
SHIFT key - Sprint
CTRL key - Crouch

TIPS

-Play the game in the dark, or you won't see a thing
-Use headphones, there's 3D audio
-Use lightsticks to draw your path
-Turning off your flashlight could be useful
-Don't let it deceive you: this game can be finished

SPECIAL THANKS

my beloved Leira
Jak
freesound.org
